p: This work was supported by the French Governmentunder the “Investments for the Future” program managed by the National Agency for Research (ANR) (No. Méditerranée-Infection10-IAHU-03) and was also supported by Région Provence-Alpes-Côte d’Azur and European funding FEDER PRIMMI ( Fonds Européen de Développement Régional - Plateformes de Recherche et d'Innovation Mutualisées Méditerranée Infection).
